synopsis.text:
Kiiko, Sousei, and the Kumou brothers find themselves navigating a new world in the aftermath of their epic clash with the colossal serpent, Orochi. The once unified team has fractured, with their eldest brother Tenka withdrawing from society after being left paralyzed from the battle. As Soramaru and Chutaro uncover Tenka's involvement in a secret government experiment, they join forces with Kiiko and Sousei to reconnect with their estranged brother.

This series of interconnected tales expands on the universe of Donten ni Warau, offering a deeper look into the characters' pasts and futures. As the Kumou siblings strive to mend their bond, hidden truths from Tenka's history come to light, revealing a complex web of loyalty, love, and sacrifice. This captivating trilogy invites viewers to embark on an emotional journey filled with action, adventure, and intrigue.
